module.title: Resource: Shares
module.description:
Public share links.
Each share link will have an unguessable link and a QR code. Depending in access type, the user will have to answer a CAPTCHA code. The share link will redirect to a given resource. This resource must be available for visitors, too.
This module will need the sever router module and a route.
module.log: Use system temp folder for file creation.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>shares`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>shares` ( `shareId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `access` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '0:public, 1:captcha, 2:login', `validity` tinyint(3) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `moduleId` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `relationId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `path` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `uuid` varchar(36) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `accessedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`shareId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `access` (`access`), KEY `validity` (`validity`), KEY `moduleId` (`moduleId`), KEY `relationId` (`relationId`), KEY `uuid` (`uuid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
